emerging.translation[0].definitions[0].d: in an early state of development
emerging.translation[1].definitions[0].d: in an early state of development
emerging.translation[1].definitions[1].d: countries, especially those in Asia, Africa, and South America that are just starting to have influence or power in trade, finance etc
emerging.translation[1].definitions[1].e: The EU is allowing emerging economies to have greater access to their products.
